Contains exactly one [1..1] hearingAbility with data type Code
Describes patient's hearing ability at time of Admission/Discharge. Possible values are Normal or Minimal Loss, Moderate Loss, Severe Loss, Total Loss, Not Determined etc

Contains exactly one [1..1] visionAbility with data type Code
Describes patient's Vision ability at time of Admission/Discharge. Possible values are Normal or Minimal Loss, Moderate Loss, Severe Loss, Total Loss, Not Determined etc

Contains exactly one [1..1] expressiveCommunicationAbility with data type Code
Describes patient's ability to communicate with others at time of Admission/Discharge. Possible values are Speaks and is Usually Understood; Speaks But is Understood Only with Difficulty; Uses Only Sign Language, Symbol Board or Writing; Uses Only Gestures, Grunts, or Primitive Symbols; Does Not Convey Needs; Not Determined etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] receptiveCommunicationAbility with data type Code
Describes patient's ability to understand others at time of Admission/Discharge. Possible values are Usually Understands Oral Communication; Has Limited Comprehension of Oral Communication; Understands by Depending on Lip Reading, Written Material, or Sign Language; Understands Primitive Gestures, Facial Expres., Pictograms, and/or Env. Cues; Does Not Understand; Not Determined etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] primaryDiagnosis, where its type is Diagnosis
The primary diagnosis of the patient at admission or discharge
